start_coffee_machine.description: Press the button to initiate brewing process.

maintain_button.description: Wipe the button to keep it clean and functional.

press_button.description: Press the button to start the coffee machine.

clean_button.description: Clean the button to ensure it functions smoothly.

activate_coffee_machine.description: Activate the coffee machine by pressing the button.

clean_machine_body.description: Wipe the coffee machine body to keep it clean and shiny.

clean_coffee_machine_body.description: Clean the coffee machine body to maintain hygiene.

clean_coffee_machine_exterior.description: Clean the exterior of the coffee machine to keep it free from dust and stains.

inspect_coffee_machine.description: Inspect the coffee machine body for potential issues or damages.

clean_whole_machine.description: Clean the entire coffee machine inclusive of button and body to ensure hygiene.

brew_and_clean.description: Start the brewing process and following brewing wipe the entire machine.

clean_whole_coffee_machine.description: Clean the whole coffee machine including the button and the body.

press_button_and_clean.description: Press the button to start the coffee machine and then clean the whole machine.

maintain_coffee_machine.description: Activate the coffee machine and clean its body for optimum functionality.

full_service.description: Clean the coffee machine's button and body, then activate the machine.
